Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi, our account spent money today and the ads have a day parting filter not to spend on Sunday. Very strange.

Hi Victor, that does sound strange. Let's check a few things to troubleshoot this issue. First, can you confirm if the day parting filter was correctly set up in your Ad Manager? Sometimes, settings might not save properly. If everything looks correct on your end, it might be a technical glitch. I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details of your account and the issue you're facing. They will be able to investigate further and assist you.
